Bernadette ma ọ bụ Bernadeta Nemphombe Kunambi (Amụrụ na 2 June 1934) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Tanzania. Ọ bụ National General Secretary nke YWCA, Onye isi oche nke Tanganyika Council of Women, na onye omeiwu.
A mụrụ Bernadette Kunambi na Morogoro
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Mhonda Girls School site n'afọ 1945 ruo afọ 1948.
Ọ lụrụ Patrick Kunambi (1916 ruo afọ 2011), onye isi na onye guzobere TANU bụ ezigbo enyi Julius Nyerere.

Onye Roman Katọlik, Kunambi sonyere na Nzukọ Ndịozi nke East Frican Lay Apostolate nke afọ 1961 nke Bishọp Blomjous kwadoro na Social Training Centre ya na Nyegezi. N'afọ 1969, o sonyere na Seminar Study Year, mmemme iji tụlee Chọọchị Katọlik na Tanzania n'ìhè nke Vatican II.
N'afọ 1969, Julius Nyerere họpụtara Kunambi, onye na-arụbu ọrụ dị ka onye nkuzi, dị ka Kọmishọna mpaghara maka Kilosa District.
